attributes.title: A Baby Ant Punch Me 🐜
attributes.review:
I was walking to my car when a couch fell out of the sky and hit me in the head. Because of this i went into a coma and had to go to the hospital. I finally woke up from the coma 7.8 million days later. I screeched because the hospital was not aesthetically pleasing AT ALL. I ran into a forest in Transylvania. I met and giant, disoriented, evil dolphin. In a demonic voice it threatened me saying “I am the dolphin princess. My name is Sofia the First. Download the trump app or I will slap you into the earth’s crust.” I obeyed but, it ate me. After it ate me it started yelling “Trump 2020”.  I almost through up because of the dolphin saying that. Even though it was a trumpet it could stand the taste of the musty cheeto on my phone. It regurgitate me and told me to run. I waddled first dear life. While I waddled off a giant dino nugget came out of a castle made out of t-shirts that fell out of the sky. The dino nugget ate the dolphin because the dino nugget was Gen Z. I waddled to New Zealand where an baby ant named Ricardo punched me to Australia. I was greeted by a gray polar bear seating on the toilet singing “We Just Got a Letter” from Blue’s Clues. He folded me up, put me in an envelope, and mailed me to my mother. While the polar bear was shipping me off he was singing ˢʰᵃʷᵗʸˢˡⁱᵏᵉᵃᵐᵉˡᵒᵈʸⁱⁿᵐʸʰᵉᵃᵈᵗʰᵃᵗⁱᶜᵃⁿᵗᵏᵉᵉᵖᵒᵘᵗᵍᵒᵗᵐᵉˢⁱⁿᵍⁱⁿˡⁱᵏᵉⁿᵃⁿᵃⁿᵃⁿᵃᵉᵛᵉʳʸᵈᵃʸⁱᵗˢˡⁱᵏᵉᵐʸⁱᵖᵒᵈˢˢᵗᵘᶜᵏᵒⁿʳᵉᵖˡᵃʸ. When my mother opened the envelope instead of it being me it was the oompa loompa popped out. My mom screamed and had a stroke. While that was happening my llama friend whacked the oompa loompa with a baseball bat. I am currently writing in the envelope. I am very disappointed that i couldn’t help my llama friend beat the life out of that cheeto puff. I am writing this bad review because a baby ant named Ricardo punched me and my stomach still hurts and because the polar bear is very bad at mailing letters. Anyway have a nice day🧚🏻‍♀️✨🥺💖🌼💕

Ps: the way the dino nugget say hi don’t mean say hi back🦖🦖🦖
